    • Method Detail

      • isSeqfile

        public static boolean isSeqfile(String filename)
        Predicate to check if a given filename is a SequenceFile. Inspect the first three bytes to determine the format of the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of the file to check.
        Returns:
        True if file is of SequenceFile format.

      • drmFromFile

        public static H2ODrm drmFromFile(String filename,
                 int parMin)
        Create DRM from SequenceFile. Create a Mahout DRM backed on H2O from the specified SequenceFile.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of the sequence file.
        parMin - Minimum number of data partitions in the DRM.
        Returns:
        DRM object created.

      • drmFromSeqfile

        public static H2ODrm drmFromSeqfile(String filename,
                    int parMin)
        Internal method called from drmFromFile if format verified.

      • drmToFile

        public static void drmToFile(String filename,
             H2ODrm drm)
                      throws IOException
        Create SequenceFile on HDFS from DRM object.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename to create and store DRM data in.
        drm - DRM object storing Matrix data in memory.
        Throws:
        IOException
